stigmata.skill: (Require top stigmata piece) Squad members within the water ball blast wave restore ? / 500 HP

stigmata.set1: Increase timed explosive water ball by 2.0 meter radius, and inflict 1.5 seconds freeze status to enemies within the explosion
stigmata.set2: Timed explosive water ball deal additional 200% ice elemental damage, and reduce cooldown time by 2.0 seconds

stigmata.set1:
